articles.description: Products are at the centre of a legal dispute over patents for health technology
articles.content: A US appeals court has allowed a sales ban to resume on Apples Watch Series 9 and Ultra 2, the latest setback in the technology giants dispute with health technology company Masimo over patents for i… [+2218 chars]

articles.author: John Hyatt
articles.title: How Vivek Ramaswamy Got Richer While Pumping Millions Into Failed Presidential Campaign - Forbes
articles.description: The biotech founder and anti-woke activist spent millions on his unsuccessful campaign, yet he is wealthier now than when he entered the race 11 months ago.
articles.content: Long shot presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy dropped out of the race on Monday, but with it came a silver lining. While he was campaigning for the Republican nomination in Iowa where he came in a… [+5546 chars]
